annotations.description: A delicious Negroni variation with Amaro Montenegro! I wanted to get this cocktail out to you before Negroni Week was a distant memory, although it is over f...
annotations.title: Original Cocktail: Mulholland Drive

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Campari
1oz (30ml) Mulholland Gin
1oz (30ml) Amaro Montenegro
1 Barspoon Mr. Black Coffee Liqueur
Orange Twist

Stir over ice in rocks glass

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gsyy9jrHBcM
title: Mulholland Drive
